list_definition.definition: a website, often updated daily, in which someone writes about their thoughts or experiences relating to a particular subject

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: What has he been blogging about recently?

list_ex_of_english: She was also charged for communicating with the boy via blogs and a website.
However, we share the view, with many web-bloggers, that violations and slander are equally punishable on web-blogs as in other media.
Other blogs such as the have also picked up on the acts.
You order up sample textbooks from publishers' websites, and of course you look at how your peers have covered the same material, browsing their websites and reading their blogs.
Blogs and other 'user-generated content' provide a lively contribution to the multifaceted media landscape and are increasingly influential in the interpretation of news and current affairs.
One of the blogs belongs to the gorilla zookeeper.
Blogs have redefined our relationship to the content industry as they allowed access to non-professional content.
